alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 05 at 12:01PM AKST until February 07 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST TUESDAY... ...BLIZZARD WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Wind chills to 30 below. * WHERE...near the Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow drifts will form. Wind chills to 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds are not as strong and conditions are much less severe over St Lawrence Island.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
